PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 1997-17821997-12-020TC,  ,  ,  , 
PrecisRe-appointment of MERVYN C. RUSSELL, of Halifax, Nova Scotia, as chairman of the board of directors of the Halifax Port Corporation to hold office during pleasure for a term of six months, effective January 1, 1998; and approval of the re-appointment by the Minister of Transport of MERVYN C. RUSSELL, of Halifax, Nova Scotia, as a part-time director of the Board of Directors of the Canada Ports Corporation to hold office during pleasure for a term of six months, effective January 1, 1998.
